function.name: metrics/aero-rp-shift-mac
function.description:
Mach-tuck: Transonic Shift of Aerodynamic Center
NASA-TN-D-7505 page 134 - Configuration: Wing II and Canard II
===============
I now have a better source than the above, from official aerodynamic compendium:

function.name: aero/coefficient/CN
function.description:
Normal force due to alpha, ground-effect and elevator
Increase in CN decreases Period and damping, Dutch Roll damping CN is low for landing

function.name: aero/coefficient/CNGnd
function.description: Change in normal force due to ground effect factor

function.name: aero/coefficient/CNGndElevator
function.description: Normal force due to elevator due to groundeffect

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-axial
function.description: Change in axial due to ground effect

function.name: aero/function/stores-wave-drag-factor
function.description: Change in stores drag due to mach

function.name: aero/function/mach-effect-drag
function.description: Change in force due to mach effect

function.name: aero/function/Afactors
function.description: Change in axial due to mach and ground effect

function.name: aero/coefficient/CAtakeoff
function.description: Axial force due to flaps and gear

function.name: aero/coefficient/CACanopyOff
function.description: Canopy axial Coefficient for broken off

function.name: aero/coefficient/CAMissile5
function.description: Left outer wing pylon axial Coefficient

function.name: aero/coefficient/CAMissile6
function.description: Right outer wing pylon axial Coefficient

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyb
function.description:
Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip
Contributes to damping of Dutch Roll mode

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cybtank
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip due to drop tank

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cyzero
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to asymmetric detachment of fuselage vortices

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clb
function.description:
Roll damp due to sideslip
Decrease of Clb to small negative value improves Dutch Roll Damping High Positive value leads to excessive spiral instability

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cltank
function.description: Roll damp due to drop tank

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clp
function.description:
Roll damp due to roll rate
Clp alone determines damping-in-roll characteristics

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clr
function.description:
Roll due to yaw rate
Considerable effect on Spiral mode. Large positive values leads to strong spiral instability.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Clpylon
function.description: Roll due to missile asymmetric loaded under wings

function.name: aero/coefficient/Claileron
function.description: Roll due to aileron and elevator

function.name: aero/function/CA-intake-flow-number
function.description:
mil*factor CA = ____________________________ rho*intakeArea*freeflowspeed
intakeArea = 0.6 m^2 / 6.46 ft^2 freeflowspeed = velocities/uBody-fps rho = atmosphere/rho-slugs_ft3 mil = propulsion/engine/MilThrust factor = 0.0001395
The limitation of this is that it wont work so well near idle thrust, as it depend on mil thrust. So the factor will be bit too large when running with idle thrust.

function.name: aero/coefficient/CmCA
function.description:
Pitch due to Air intake flow number
Using 3D table due to alpha data points not being the same, the extra column is required, and is therefore a copy
[measured using graph analyser]

function.name: aero/coefficient/CmZero
function.description:
Pitch due to Zero moment
Zero moment: Cm part that is independent of alpha.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmq
function.description:
Pitch damping due to pitch rate
Pitch Damping Derivative Very important to Short Period damping of oscillations

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cmadot
function.description:
Pitch damping due to alpha rate
Negative Cmad increase Short Period damping
This is also what drives pitch turbulence.

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnb
function.description:
Yaw due to sideslip
Determines Dutch Roll and Spiral characteristics Prevents side-slip and yawing moments

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnzero
function.description: Yaw due to asymmetric detachment of vortexes

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnp
function.description:
Yawing due to roll rate
Reduces Dutch Roll damping positive value desireable

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnr
function.description:
Yaw damping due to yaw rate
Main contributor to damping of Dutch Roll

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cntank
function.description:
Yaw due drop tank
Data is from alpha=16 and gears and flaps deployed.

function.name: aero/coefficient/CnStores
function.description: Yaw due asymmetric stores on wing pylons

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cnaileron
function.description: yaw due to aileron and elevator
